data.name: Greak: Memories of Azur Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Greak: Memories of Azur soundtrack includes 20 original tracks performed live by the Philharmonic Orchestra Cinco de Mayo from Puebla, Mexico. The  tracks are composed by Oscar Alcalá & María José Félix
data.about_the_game: Greak: Memories of Azur soundtrack includes 20 original tracks performed live by the Philharmonic Orchestra Cinco de Mayo from Puebla, Mexico. The  tracks are composed by Oscar Alcalá & María José Félix
data.short_description: Greak: Memories of Azur soundtrack includes 20 original tracks performed live by the Philharmonic Orchestra Cinco de Mayo from Puebla, Mexico. The tracks are composed by Oscar Alcalá & María José Félix

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 96 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 689 MB available space
